input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup butterscotch chips, 1 cup butter (no substitutes), softened, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup packed brown sugar, 1 egg, 2 tablespoons milk, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 3 cups all-purpose flour, 3/4 cup shortening, 1/4 cup water, 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 4 cups confectioners' sugar, Paste food coloring, 
Directions: 0) In a microwave, melt butterscotch chips; cool for 10 minutes. 1) In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugars. 2) Add egg, milk and vanilla; mix well. 3) Beat in melted chips. 4) Gradually add flour; mix well. 5) Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour. 6) On a floured surface, roll out dough to 1/4-in. thickness. 7) Cut with a floured 4-1/2-in. gingerbread man cookie cutter and a 3-in. round cutter. 8) Place 2 in. apart on greased baking sheets. 9) Bake at 375 degrees F for 5-8 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. 10) Cool for 1 minute; remove to wire racks to cool completely. 11) For frosting, combine shortening, water, flour and vanilla in a mixing bowl; mix well. 12) gradually beat in sugar. 13) Place 1 cup frosting in a plastic bag; cut a small hole in corner of bag. 14) Pipe shirt and shorts on players. 15) Fill in outline and smooth with a metal spatula. 16) Tint 1/4 cup frosting black; place in a plastic bag. 17) Pipe lines on round cookies to create basketballs; pipe hair, eyes and noses on players. 18) Tint 1/4 cup frosting red; pipe a mouth on each player. 19) Tint remaining frosting to match team colors of your choice; pipe around shirts and shorts and add a letter on shirts if desired.
Question: I do! Let's do it! Can we first prepare the ingredients?
llama_answers: <no answer>

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (21 ounce) can cherry pie filling, 1 (16.5 ounce) can pitted dark sweet cherries, 1 (18.25 ounce) package chocolate cake mix, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 3/4 cup butter, cut into pieces, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 1) Spray 9x13 baking dish with cooking spray. 2) Dump cherry pie filling into dish and spread evenly. 3) Repeat with cherries, including juice. 4) Sprinkle cake mix over the top - DO NOT STIR. 5) Sprinkle with chopped nuts. 6) Distribute butter pieces evenly over the top. 7) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 3/4 cup melted butter, divided, 1 pound fresh mushrooms, stems removed, 1 cup crushed seasoned croutons, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, drained, 1 pound lobster tail, cleaned and chopped, 3 tablespoons minced garlic, 1/4 cup shredded mozzarella cheese (optional), 
Directions: 0) Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 1) Brush a large baking sheet with about 1/4 cup of melted butter. 2) Arrange mushroom caps in a single layer over the baking sheet. 3) In a medium bowl, mix together the crushed croutons, remaining 1/2 cup butter, shredded cheese, crabmeat, lobster and garlic. 4) Spoon into mushroom caps where the stems used to be. 5) Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, or until lightly browned on the top. 6) Sprinkle with additional cheese if desired, and serve hot!
Question: Hi. How do I make crab and lobster stuffed mushrooms?
llama_answers: Sprinkle with additional cheese if desired, and serve hot!

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 cups toasted wheat germ, 1 cup quick-cooking oats, 1 cup packed brown sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup unsweetened applesauce, 1/2 cup canola oil, 2 egg, lightly beaten, 1 cup miniature chocolate chips, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts or pecans, 
Directions: 0) In a large mixing bowl, combine the first six ingredients. 1) Combine the applesauce, oil and eggs. 2) Add to the flour mixture; mix well. 3) Stir in the chocolate chip and walnuts. 4) Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2 in apart onto baking sheets coated with nonstick cooking spray. 5) Flatten slightly with a glass bottom coated with nonstick cooking spray. 6) Bake at 350 degrees F for 10-12 minutes or until edges are lightly browned and cookies are set. 7) Cool for 1 minute before removing to wire racks.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 1/2 cup butter, softened, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 cup white sugar, 1/3 cup milk, 1/2 pound ground walnuts, 1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration, 
Directions: 0) Beat together cream cheese and margarine until well blended. 1) Add flour, mixing well. 2) Shape into a ball, cover and chill for 2 hours. 3) In saucepan over medium heat, cook sugar and milk, stirring occasionally until milk boils and sugar is dissolved. 4) Add the ground nuts. 5) Remove from heat and let cool until mixture is of spreading consistency. 6) Roll out chilled dough on lightly floured surface to a rectangle about 18 X 12 inches. 7) Cut in half lengthwise. 8) Spread each piece with milk/nut filling and roll up like a jelly-roll, starting from the long side. 9) Cut each roll in half. 10) Place seam side down on ungreased cookie sheets (two on a baking sheet). 11) Leaving roll's shape intact, cut into slices 1/2 inch thick almost to the bottom of the roll. 12) Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 15 to 20 minutes or till done. 13) Remove from sheet and sprinkle with confectioners' sugar. 14) Cool on racks. 15) Cut cookies all the way through. 16) Refrigerate or freeze. 17) Resprinkle with confectioners' sugar before serving.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup butter, 1 cup vegetable oil, 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup packed brown sugar, 2 eggs, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 4 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 4 teaspoons cream of tartar, 1 teaspoon salt, 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, 1 cup chopped walnuts (optional), 
Directions: 0) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) In a large bowl, cream together the butter, oil, brown sugar, and white sugar until smooth. 2) Beat in the eggs and vanilla. 3) Combine the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. 4) Mix in the chocolate chips and walnuts. 5) Drop dough by rounded teaspoons onto ungreased cookie sheets. 6) Bake for 12 to 15 minutes in the preheated oven, or until light brown. 7) Allow cookies to cool on the baking sheets for a couple of minutes before transferring to wire racks to cool completely.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons cooking oil, 3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch pieces, sea salt to taste, 1 tablespoon chili powder, or to taste, 1/2 tablespoon ground cumin, or to taste, 1 dried chipotle chili pepper, ground into powder, ground black pepper to taste, 1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper, 1 small yellow onion, diced, 1 medium green bell pepper, diced, 1 medium yellow bell pepper, diced, 5 cups water, 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, undrained, 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, undrained, 1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained, 1 teaspoon green pepper sauce (e.g., Tabasco), 1 (6 ounce) can roasted garlic tomato paste, 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped, 
Directions: 0) Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat. 1) Place chicken in the pot; brown on all sides. 2) Season with sea salt, chili powder, cumin, ground chipotle, black pepper,  and cayenne pepper. 3) Mix in onion, green bell pepper, and yellow bell pepper. 4) Pour in about 3 cups water, and continue cooking 10 minutes, until about 1/2 the water has evaporated. 5) Mix the kidney beans, black beans, and corn into the pot. 6) Season with green pepper sauce. 7) Reduce heat to low, and mix in remaining 2 cups water and tomato paste. 8) Simmer, stirring occasionally 30 minutes, or until thickened. 9) Top with cilantro to serve.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons cooking oil, 3 large skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch pieces, sea salt to taste, 1 tablespoon chili powder, or to taste, 1/2 tablespoon ground cumin, or to taste, 1 dried chipotle chili pepper, ground into powder, ground black pepper to taste, 1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne pepper, 1 small yellow onion, diced, 1 medium green bell pepper, diced, 1 medium yellow bell pepper, diced, 5 cups water, 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, undrained, 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, undrained, 1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained, 1 teaspoon green pepper sauce (e.g., Tabasco), 1 (6 ounce) can roasted garlic tomato paste, 1 bunch fresh cilantro, chopped, 
Directions: 0) Heat the oil in a large pot over medium heat. 1) Place chicken in the pot; brown on all sides. 2) Season with sea salt, chili powder, cumin, ground chipotle, black pepper,  and cayenne pepper. 3) Mix in onion, green bell pepper, and yellow bell pepper. 4) Pour in about 3 cups water, and continue cooking 10 minutes, until about 1/2 the water has evaporated. 5) Mix the kidney beans, black beans, and corn into the pot. 6) Season with green pepper sauce. 7) Reduce heat to low, and mix in remaining 2 cups water and tomato paste. 8) Simmer, stirring occasionally 30 minutes, or until thickened. 9) Top with cilantro to serve.
Question: How large should the cans be? 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, undrained Ok. Done. 5) Mix the kidney beans, black beans, and corn into the pot. How large does the can have to be?
target_answer: 1 (11 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
llama_answers: 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, undrained.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided, 2 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, 1 1/2 tablespoons Cajun seasoning, 2 cloves garlic, crushed, 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar, 1 teaspoon Dijon mustard, salt and black pepper to taste, 2 cups mixed salad greens, 1 cup arugula, 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and diced, 12 oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and sliced, 1/2 cup sliced black olives, 
Directions: 0) Warm 1 tablespoon olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 1) Season both sides of chicken with Cajun seasoning, and place in hot oil. 2) Stir in crushed garlic. 3) Cook chicken 5 minutes on each side, or until juices run clear. 4) Remove chicken from skillet, drain on paper towels, cool slightly, and dice; discard oil and garlic. 5) In a small bowl, mix remaining olive oil, balsamic vinegar, mustard, salt, and pepper. 6) In a large bowl, gently toss the dressing with the mixed salad greens, arugula, avocado, sun-dried tomatoes, and olives. 7) Top with diced chicken to serve.
Question: Ok good, yes what are the first two ingredients?
llama_answers: 2 tablespoons olive oil, divided.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 3 tablespoons crushed black peppercorns, 2 (8 ounce) beef top sirloin steaks, 1 tablespoon lemon pepper, 1 teaspoon salt, 5 tablespoons butter, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup red wine, 3 tablespoons brandy, 1/4 cup chopped green onions, 1 shallot, chopped, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1 teaspoon white sugar (optional), 
Directions: 0) Press crushed peppercorns into both sides of each steak. 1) Sprinkle with lemon pepper, and salt. 2) Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. 3) Stir in garlic and wine, and cook for 1 minute. 4) Arrange steaks in pan, and cook for 5 to 10 minutes per side, or until desired doneness. 5) Reduce heat to low. 6) Pour brandy onto steaks, and carefully light with a match. 7) Let the flames burn off. 8) Sprinkle green onion and shallot around the steaks, and circle the steaks with cream. 9) Cook, stirring sauce, until hot. 10) Transfer steaks to plates. 11) Stir sugar into sauce, and then spoon over meat.

Ingredients: 3 tablespoons crushed black peppercorns, 2 (8 ounce) beef top sirloin steaks, 1 tablespoon lemon pepper, 1 teaspoon salt, 5 tablespoons butter, 2 cloves garlic, minced, 1/2 cup red wine, 3 tablespoons brandy, 1/4 cup chopped green onions, 1 shallot, chopped, 1/2 cup heavy cream, 1 teaspoon white sugar (optional), 
Directions: 0) Press crushed peppercorns into both sides of each steak. 1) Sprinkle with lemon pepper, and salt. 2) Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. 3) Stir in garlic and wine, and cook for 1 minute. 4) Arrange steaks in pan, and cook for 5 to 10 minutes per side, or until desired doneness. 5) Reduce heat to low. 6) Pour brandy onto steaks, and carefully light with a match. 7) Let the flames burn off. 8) Sprinkle green onion and shallot around the steaks, and circle the steaks with cream. 9) Cook, stirring sauce, until hot. 10) Transfer steaks to plates. 11) Stir sugar into sauce, and then spoon over meat.

llama_answers: <no answer>

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, 1 tablespoon vegetable oil, 1 onion, chopped, 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, 1 (14.5 ounce) can stewed tomatoes, 12 small chile peppers, diced  (optional), 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup, 1 (14.5 ounce) can chicken broth, 1 bunch green onions, chopped, 1/2 pint heavy cream, 6 (6 inch) corn tortillas, 3 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 (10 ounce) can enchilada sauce, 
Directions: 0) Cut chicken breasts into 1 inch strips. 1) Place in a medium bowl with desired marinade, and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes. 2) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 3) Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 4) Saute chicken and onions until chicken is evenly brown. 5) Stir in diced tomatoes with green chile peppers, stewed tomatoes, chile peppers, soup and broth. 6) Bring mixture to a boil. 7) Reduce heat, cover skillet, and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink and juices run clear. 8) Remove chicken from skillet, and shred when cool enough to handle. 9) Meanwhile, allow skillet mixture to simmer and reduce to about 2 1/4 cups. 10) In a medium bowl, combine shredded chicken and about 1/4 cup skillet mixture (just enough to make a paste like mixture). 11) Mix together with half the chopped green onions. 12) Pour remaining 2 cups of skillet mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish. 13) In a second skillet, heat cream over low heat, being careful not to boil. 14) Dip tortillas in the warm cream to soften and coat. 15) Spoon about 1/3 cup chicken mixture onto each tortilla. 16) Top chicken mixture with half the shredded cheese, and roll up tortillas. 17) Place rolled tortillas in baking dish, seam side down, and drizzle with enchilada sauce. 18) Cover with remaining shredded cheese, and sprinkle remaining chopped green onion over cheese. 19) Bake uncovered in preheated oven for 25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and bubbling.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 12 leaves cabbage, 1 cup cooked white rice, 1 egg, beaten, 1/4 cup milk, 1/4 cup minced onion, 1 pound extra-lean ground beef, 1 1/4 teaspoons salt, 1 1/4 teaspoons ground black pepper, 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce, 1 tablespoon brown sugar, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 
Directions: 0) Bring a large pot of water to a boil. 1) Boil cabbage leaves 2 minutes; drain. 2) In large bowl, combine 1 cup cooked rice, egg, milk, onion, ground beef, salt, and pepper. 3) Place about 1/4 cup of meat mixture in center of each cabbage leaf, and roll up, tucking in ends. 4) Place rolls in slow cooker. 5) In a small bowl, mix together tomato sauce, brown sugar, lemon juice, and Worcestershire sauce. 6) Pour over cabbage rolls. 7) Cover, and cook on low 8 to 9 hours.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 spaghetti squash, halved lengthwise and seeded, 1 onion, chopped, 2 tablespoons minced garlic, 2 (14 ounce) cans stewed tomatoes, 1 tablespoon dried basil, 1 cube vegetable bouillon, black pepper to taste, 1 (15 ounce) can black olives, chopped, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 cup shredded Parmesan cheese, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 1) Spray a baking sheet with a thin layer of cooking spray. 2) Place squash halves cut side down on the baking sheet. 3) Bake squash 35 minutes in the preheated oven, or until a knife can be easily inserted. 4) Remove from oven, and cool. 5) Meanwhile, spray a non-stick saucepan with cooking spray. 6) Over medium heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden brown. 7) Stir in tomatoes, basil, bouillon cube, and black pepper. 8) Cook for about 15 minutes, or until you have a medium thick sauce. 9) Remove squash strands with a fork, reserving the shells. 10) Layer each half with a spoonful of the sauce, a layer of spaghetti squash strands, olives, and mozzarella cheese. 11) Repeat layers until shells are full, or until all of the ingredients are used. 12) Top with Parmesan cheese. 13) Bake for 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until Parmesan cheese melts.

Directions: 0) Wash chicken breasts in water and then place in a pot with water just to cover the chicken. 1) Add some salt and pepper and garlic powder. 2) Let cool in the pot. 3) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 4) Wash and cut potatoes into bite size pieces and boil till almost fork tender. 5) Drain and set aside. 6) Wash celery and cut to bite-size pieces. 7) Cut onion to bite-size pieces. 8) In a large heavy skillet, over medium heat, saute celery and onion with 2 tablespoons oil, for 5 to 8 minutes. 9) Add the frozen vegetables and cook another 5 minutes. 10) Add flour and cook about 30 seconds. 11) Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. 12) After it has become thick, add potatoes. 13) Remove chicken from pot and cut into bite-size pieces and add to vegetable mixture. 14) Add salt and pepper to taste. 15) Pour mixture into a 9 inch deep dish pie plate and cover with pie shell. 16) Make sure you crimp the edges of the pie shell to the plate so no juices spill in oven. 17) Bake at 350  degrees F (175 degrees C) for 45 minutes or until pie shell is cooked and golden brown.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 6 cups all-purpose flour, 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 3 tablespoons sugar, 2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast, 2 teaspoons salt, 2 cups warm milk, 1 egg, 
Directions: 0) In a large mixing bowl, combine 3 cups flour, cheese, sugar, yeast and salt. 1) Add milk and egg; beat on low speed until smooth. 2) Stir in enough remaining flour to form a soft dough. 3) Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes. 4) Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top. 5) Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour. 6) Punch dough down. 7) Divide in half and shape into two loaves. 8) Place in two greased 9-in pans. 9) Cover and let rise until doubled, about 45 minutes. 10) Bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown. 11) Remove from pans to cool on wire racks.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/2 cup margarine, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup molasses, 1 egg yolk, 2 cups sifted all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1/2 teaspoon baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon ground cloves, 1 teaspoon ginger, 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, cream together the margarine and sugar until smooth. 1) Stir in molasses and egg yolk. 2) Combine the flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, ginger, and nutmeg; blend into the molasses mixture until smooth. 3) Cover, and chill for at least one hour. 4) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 5) On a lightly floured surface, roll the dough out to 1/4 inch thickness. 6) Cut into desired shapes with cookie cutters. 7) Place cookies 2 inches apart on ungreased cookie sheets. 8) Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until firm. 9) Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks. 10) Frost or decorate when cool.

Ingredients: 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 onion, chopped, 2 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped, 1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced, 10 fresh mushrooms, quartered, 6 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced, 1 cup fresh corn kernels, 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 teaspoon ground cumin, 1 tablespoon chili powder, 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, drained and rinsed, 1 1/2 cups chicken broth, 1 teaspoon salt,

Recipe:
Ingredients: 12 ounces dry fettuccine pasta, 1 pound lean ground beef (optional), 1 cup chopped onion, 1 cup red bell pepper, chopped, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 (29 ounce) can diced tomatoes, 1 (4 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, 3 tablespoons chopped black olives, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup, 1/4 cup beef broth, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 
Directions: 0) Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. 1) Cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain. 2) In a large skillet, brown beef over medium heat. 3) Drain fat from pan, and transfer meat to a bowl. 4) In the same skillet, cook onion and bell pepper in butter until tender. 5) Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, olives, and  beef, and season with oregano. 6) Simmer for 10 minutes. 7) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 8) Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. 9) Arrange half of the cooked fettuccine in the prepared dish, top with half of the beef and vegetable mixture, and sprinkle with 1/2 cup of Cheddar cheese and 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese. 10) Repeat layers. 11) Mix together soup and beef broth until smooth, and pour over casserole. 12) Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. 13) Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until heated through.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 12 ounces dry fettuccine pasta, 1 pound lean ground beef (optional), 1 cup chopped onion, 1 cup red bell pepper, chopped, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 (29 ounce) can diced tomatoes, 1 (4 ounce) can sliced mushrooms, 3 tablespoons chopped black olives, 2 teaspoons dried oregano, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup, 1/4 cup beef broth, 1/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 
Directions: 0) Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. 1) Cook pasta for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain. 2) In a large skillet, brown beef over medium heat. 3) Drain fat from pan, and transfer meat to a bowl. 4) In the same skillet, cook onion and bell pepper in butter until tender. 5) Stir in tomatoes, mushrooms, olives, and  beef, and season with oregano. 6) Simmer for 10 minutes. 7) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 8) Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. 9) Arrange half of the cooked fettuccine in the prepared dish, top with half of the beef and vegetable mixture, and sprinkle with 1/2 cup of Cheddar cheese and 1/2 cup of mozzarella cheese. 10) Repeat layers. 11) Mix together soup and beef broth until smooth, and pour over casserole. 12) Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. 13) Bake in preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, or until heated through.
Question: Yes please I'd like beef in the lasagna. I got these ingredients ready, what should I do next? 1 cup chopped onion Okay good, can I use margarine instead of butter? 1 cup chopped onion Okay no problem, could I have two more ingredients?
llama_answers: Sure! The next two ingredients you'll need are the chopped red bell pepper and the canned diced tomatoes.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces, 1 cup lemonade, 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 tablespoon lime juice, 1 1/2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1 bay leaf, 1 (12 ounce) package corn tortillas, 1 head lettuce, shredded, 2 large tomatoes, chopped, 1 (8 ounce) package shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, 1 (8 ounce) jar salsa, 1 (8 ounce) container sour cream, 
Directions: 0) In a large skillet over medium heat, combine chicken, lemonade, olive oil, lime juice, and Worcestershire sauce. 1) Season with garlic powder, onion powder, and bay leaf. 2) Simmer until chicken is no longer pink, and juices run clear, 15 to 20 minutes. 3) Meanwhile, warm the tortillas in the oven or microwave until soft. 4) When chicken is fully cooked, transfer to serving bowl. 5) Place lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, salsa, and sour cream in serving dishes. 6) Each person can create their own wrap, using their preferred ingredients.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 1/4 pounds ground beef, 3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce, 1 1/2 tablespoons dried basil, or to taste, 1/4 teaspoon garlic salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 4 hamburger buns, split, 
Directions: 0) Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat. 1) In a bowl, mix the ground beef, Worcestershire sauce, basil, garlic salt, and pepper. 2) Form the mixture into 4 burger patties. 3) Lightly oil the grill grate, and cook burgers about 6 minutes, turning once, to an internal temperature of 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), or to desired doneness. 4) Serve on hamburger buns.

Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease a 9x13 inch pan. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and cinnamon. 3) Set aside. 4) In a large bowl, combine the sugar and oil until blended. 5) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla. 6) Stir in the flour mixture just until incorporated. 7) Fold in the pineapple, carrots, coconut and walnuts. 8) Pour batter into prepared pan. 9) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 10) While still warm, poke holes in the cake with a fork. 11) For the glaze: In a saucepan, combine butter, sugar, buttermilk and vanilla. 12) Bring mixture to a boil over medium heat, then reduce heat and cook for 5 minutes. 13) Pour glaze over warm cake, then allow to cool completely.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup water, 2 1/2 tablespoons white sugar, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 cup all-purpose flour, 2 quarts oil for frying, 1/2 cup white sugar, or to taste, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 
Directions: 0) In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine water, 2 1/2 tablespoons sugar, salt and 2 tablespoons vegetable oil. 1) Bring to a boil and remove from heat. 2) Stir in flour until mixture forms a ball. 3) Heat oil for frying in deep-fryer or deep skillet to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 4) Pipe strips of dough into hot oil using a pastry bag. 5) Fry until golden; drain on paper towels. 6) Combine 1/2 cup sugar and cinnamon. 7) Roll drained churros in cinnamon and sugar mixture.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 2 1/2 cups dark brown sugar, 3 eggs, 1 1/2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup water, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, 1 egg yolk, 4 cups confectioners' sugar, 2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 2 tablespoons heavy cream, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 2 cups bittersweet chocolate chips, 1 cup heavy cream, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour 2 (9 inch) pans. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt. 3) Set aside. 4) In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 5) Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm. 6) In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. 7) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. 8) Stir in the melted chocolate. 9) Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the sour cream. 10) Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin). 11) Pour batter into prepared pans. 12) Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 13) Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely. 14) Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 15) In a large bowl, whip the butter for about 10 minutes until it is super fluffy, beat in egg yolk. 16) Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar, alternating with 2 tablespoons vanilla and 2 tablespoons cream, then blend in the melted chocolate. 17) Beat in the softened cream cheese. 18) Make the Ganache: In a large saucepan, combine chocolate chips and 1 cup heavy cream. 19) Heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 20) Remove from heat and set aside. 21) Assemble the cake: When cake is completely cooled, cover the bottom cake layer with as much ganache as desired. 22) Refrigerate for 5 minutes, or until ganache has set. 23) Spread frosting over the ganache. 24) Cover with top layer of cake. 25) Frost top and sides with buttercream, and garnish with more ganache.
Question: Wow! Could you tell me the ingredients first?

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons baking soda, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/2 cup unsalted butter, 2 1/2 cups dark brown sugar, 3 eggs, 1 1/2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 1 cup sour cream, 1 cup water, 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped, 1/4 cup unsalted butter, 1 egg yolk, 4 cups confectioners' sugar, 2 tablespoons vanilla extract, 2 tablespoons heavy cream, 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened, 2 cups bittersweet chocolate chips, 1 cup heavy cream, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour 2 (9 inch) pans. 2) Sift together the flour, baking soda and salt. 3) Set aside. 4) In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 5) Remove from heat and allow to cool to lukewarm. 6) In a large bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy. 7) Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in 1 1/2 teaspoon vanilla. 8) Stir in the melted chocolate. 9) Beat in the flour mixture alternately with the sour cream. 10) Stir in boiling water (batter will be thin). 11) Pour batter into prepared pans. 12) Bake in the preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean. 13) Let cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack and cool completely. 14) Make the Chocolate Buttercream Frosting: In the top of a double boiler, heat 6 ounces chocolate, stirring occasionally, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 15) In a large bowl, whip the butter for about 10 minutes until it is super fluffy, beat in egg yolk. 16) Gradually blend in the confectioners' sugar, alternating with 2 tablespoons vanilla and 2 tablespoons cream, then blend in the melted chocolate. 17) Beat in the softened cream cheese. 18) Make the Ganache: In a large saucepan, combine chocolate chips and 1 cup heavy cream. 19) Heat, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and smooth. 20) Remove from heat and set aside. 21) Assemble the cake: When cake is completely cooled, cover the bottom cake layer with as much ganache as desired. 22) Refrigerate for 5 minutes, or until ganache has set. 23) Spread frosting over the ganache. 24) Cover with top layer of cake. 25) Frost top and sides with buttercream, and garnish with more ganache.
Question: Okay good, could I use margarine instead of butter? 6 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, chopped Okay no problem, tell me the next ingredients? 1 egg yolk Good, are the ingredients over?
llama_answers: No, there are more ingredients to come.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2/3 cup butter, softened, 1/4 cup white sugar, 1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup packed light brown sugar, 2 tablespoons light corn syrup, 1/2 cup sweetened condensed milk, 1 1/4 cups milk chocolate chips, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (176 degrees C) 1) In a medium bowl, mix together 2/3 cup butter, 1/4 cup white sugar, and 1 1/4 cup flour until evenly crumbly. 2) Press into 9 inch square baking pan. 3) Bake for 20 minutes. 4) In a 2 quart saucepan, combine 1/2 cup butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, and sweetened condensed milk. 5) Bring to a boil. 6) Continue to boil for 5 minutes. 7) Remove from heat and beat vigorously with a wooden spoon for about 3 minutes. 8) Pour over baked crust (warm or cool). 9) Cool until it begins to firm. 10) Melt chocolate and pour over caramel layer. 11) Cover the layer completely. 12) Chill. 13) Cut into squares (about 48 - small because it is rich).

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 3 gallons peanut oil for frying, or as needed, 1 (12 pound) whole turkey, neck and giblets removed, 1/4 cup Creole seasoning, 1 white onion, 
Directions: 0) In a large stockpot or turkey fryer, heat oil to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Be sure to leave room for the turkey, or the oil will spill over. 2) Layer a large platter with food-safe paper bags. 3) Rinse turkey, and thoroughly pat dry with paper towels. 4) Rub Creole seasoning over turkey inside and out. 5) Make sure the hole at the neck is open at least 2 inches so the oil can flow freely through the bird. 6) Place the whole onion and turkey in drain basket. 7) The turkey should be placed in basket neck end first. 8) Slowly lower basket into hot oil to completely cover turkey. 9) Maintain the temperature of the oil at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), and cook turkey for 3 1/2 minutes per pound, about 45 minutes. 10) Carefully remove basket from oil, and drain turkey. 11) Insert a meat thermometer into the thickest part of the thigh; the internal temperature must be 180 degrees F (80 degrees C). 12) Finish draining turkey on the prepared platter.
Question: Hi. how do I make the deep fried turkey? 0) In a large stockpot or turkey fryer, heat oil to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Yes I have a turkey fryer. 0) In a large stockpot or turkey fryer, heat oil to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Ok. is that Fahrenheit or Celsius?
llama_answers: Fahrenheit.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 tablespoon butter, softened, 1 egg white, 1/4 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 1/2 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 pinch salt, 1/2 (1 ounce) square unsweetened chocolate, grated, 1/3 cup confectioners' sugar for decoration, 
Directions: 0) Preheat an oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). 1) Grease cookie sheets. 2) In a small saucepan over medium heat, melt butter till lightly browned. 3) Pour into medium sized bowl. 4) Stir in the egg white, sugar and vanilla. 5) Combine the flour cocoa, and salt; mix into the butter mixture. 6) Fold in chocolate. 7) Drop by teaspoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto cookie sheets. 8) Bake for 12 to 15 minutes. 9) Transfer to rack to cool and dust with confectioners' sugar.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 3 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped spinach, thawed, 3 eggs, 1/2 teaspoon onion salt, 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 3/4 cup grated Parmesan cheese, divided, 3/4 cup Italian seasoned bread crumbs, 16 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, salt and pepper to taste, 5 tablespoons butter or margarine, melted, 6 tablespoons butter or margarine, divided, 1/4 cup all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups milk, 2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese, 1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms, 
Directions: 0) Drain and squeeze out excess moisture from spinach. 1) Beat eggs, onion salt and nutmeg. 2) Add spinach and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese; mix well. 3) Combine bread crumbs and remaining Parmesan. 4) Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper; coat with crumb mixture. 5) Place in two greased 13-in baking pans. 6) Spread 2 tablespoons spinach mixture onto each breast. 7) Sprinkle with remaining crumb mixture; drizzle with butter. 8) Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until chicken juices run clear. 9) For sauce, melt 4 tablespoons butter; blend in flour and salt. 10) Stir to form a smooth paste. 11) Add milk; cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. 12) Add cheese and stir until melted. 13) Saute mushrooms in remaining butter. 14) Stir into cheese mixture. 15) Carefully pour sauce over chicken, or pour into a serving bowl and pass.

Directions: 0) Drain and squeeze out excess moisture from spinach. 1) Beat eggs, onion salt and nutmeg. 2) Add spinach and 1/4 cup Parmesan cheese; mix well. 3) Combine bread crumbs and remaining Parmesan. 4) Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper; coat with crumb mixture. 5) Place in two greased 13-in baking pans. 6) Spread 2 tablespoons spinach mixture onto each breast. 7) Sprinkle with remaining crumb mixture; drizzle with butter. 8) Bake at 350 degrees F for 35-40 minutes or until chicken juices run clear. 9) For sauce, melt 4 tablespoons butter; blend in flour and salt. 10) Stir to form a smooth paste. 11) Add milk; cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. 12) Add cheese and stir until melted. 13) Saute mushrooms in remaining butter. 14) Stir into cheese mixture. 15) Carefully pour sauce over chicken, or pour into a serving bowl and pass.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 eggs, 1 (12 ounce) can white tuna, 1 (6 ounce) can crabmeat, shredded, 1/2 cup mayonnaise, 1 teaspoon sour cream, 1 teaspoon yellow mustard, 1/2 teaspoon dried dill weed, 1/8 teaspoon lemon pepper, 2 tablespoons dill pickle relish, 2 tablespoons sweet pickle relish, 3/4 cup finely chopped onion, 
Directions: 0) Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with cold water. 1) Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat. 2) Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 10 to 12 minutes. 3) Remove from hot water, cool, peel and chop finely. 4) In a mixing bowl, combine tuna, crabmeat, mayonnaise, sour cream and mustard. 5) Stir in chopped egg, dill weed, lemon pepper, dill and sweet relish and chopped onion. 6) Mix thoroughly.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/4 cup lemon juice, 1/4 cup light corn syrup, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger, 1/4 cup corn oil, 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple (not drained), 10 chicken leg quarters, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Stir together lemon juice, corn syrup, soy sauce, salt, ginger, and corn oil in a bowl until smooth. 2) Stir in the crushed pineapple with its liquid. 3) Place the chicken legs in an ovenproof glass baking dish, and pour sauce over top. 4) Bake in preheated oven for 30 minutes, then turn the chicken over, and continue cooking until the chicken is tender, and no longer pink, about 20 minutes. 5) Baste with sauce frequently while baking.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) package herb-seasoned dry bread stuffing mix, 8 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, 16 medium slices mozzarella cheese,

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup white sugar, 3 eggs, 7/8 cup all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon baking powder, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground cloves, 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon ground allspice, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 cups chopped dried figs, 1 cup chopped walnuts, 1 cup confectioners' sugar for rolling, 
Directions: 0) Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour a 9x13 inch baking pan. 2) In a large bowl, beat eggs and sugar until thick and pale. 3) Sift together the flour, baking powder, salt, cloves, cinnamon and allspice; blend into the egg mixture along with the vanilla. 4) Finally fold in the chopped figs and walnuts. 5) Pour the batter into the prepared pan and spread evenly. 6) Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until lightly toasted. 7) When cool, cut into squares and roll the squares in confectioners' sugar.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 6 apples, 1 (16 ounce) can whole cranberry sauce, 1/2 cup packed brown sugar, 1/3 cup all-purpose flour, 1 1/2 teaspoons ground cinnamon, 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie,

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/2 cup butter, softened, 1 (3 ounce) package cream cheese, 1 cup sifted all-purpose flour, 1 cup fruit preserves, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 
Directions: 0) DAY BEFORE: Cream butter and cream cheese together until smoothly blended. 1) Beat in the flour. 2) Shape dough into a smooth ball, wrap in foil or cling wrap, and refrigerate overnight or up to a week. 3) AT BAKING TIME: Remove dough from refrigerator 30 minutes before using. 4) Start heating oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 5) Roll chilled dough thin. 6) Cut with 3 or 4 inch round cookie cutter. 7) Place small spoonful of jam in center of each round, moisten edges with water. 8) Fold round over and press edges together. 9) Bake on ungreased cookie sheet 15 to 20 minutes. 10) Immediately roll in sugar mixed with cinnamon (traditional) OR in confectioners' sugar if preferred.
Question: Good, could I have them first so I can prepare them?
llama_answers: No, the recipe is for cookies and you need to prepare the dough overnight in the refrigerator before baking.

Directions: 0) DAY BEFORE: Cream butter and cream cheese together until smoothly blended. 1) Beat in the flour. 2) Shape dough into a smooth ball, wrap in foil or cling wrap, and refrigerate overnight or up to a week. 3) AT BAKING TIME: Remove dough from refrigerator 30 minutes before using. 4) Start heating oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). 5) Roll chilled dough thin. 6) Cut with 3 or 4 inch round cookie cutter. 7) Place small spoonful of jam in center of each round, moisten edges with water. 8) Fold round over and press edges together. 9) Bake on ungreased cookie sheet 15 to 20 minutes. 10) Immediately roll in sugar mixed with cinnamon (traditional) OR in confectioners' sugar if preferred.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/2 cup ketchup, 4 tablespoons unsweetened pineapple juice, 4 tablespoons molasses, 2 tablespoons dark rum, 2 tablespoons prepared Dijon-style mustard, 2 cloves garlic, chopped, salt and pepper to taste, 8 chicken thighs, 
Directions: 0) To Make Glaze: In a medium bowl combine the ketchup, pineapple juice, molasses, rum, mustard and garlic. 1) Season with salt and pepper to taste and mix well. 2) Place chicken pieces in a lightly oiled 9x13 inch baking dish; brush both sides with prepared glaze, using about 1/2 of the glaze. 3) Cover dish and refrigerate to marinate for at least 2 hours or overnight. 4) Also, refrigerate remaining glaze. 5) Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C). 6) Lightly brush chicken pieces on one side with some of the reserved glaze and bake uncovered in preheated oven for about 25 minutes. 7) Turn pieces, brush with remaining glaze and bake for another 25 minutes or until chicken is tender. 8) Preheat oven to broil. 9) Put chicken under broiler and lightly brown on both sides, about 2 to 3 minutes each side.
Question: Yes that sounds like a funky mix of two different places. How many ingredients does the recipe have?

Recipe:

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 pound ground pork, 4 cups shredded cabbage, 1 large carrot, shredded, 1/2 green bell pepper, cut into thin strips, 1 medium onion, chopped, 3 cloves garlic, minced, 3 teaspoons fresh ginger root, grated, 1 tablespoon cornstarch, 2 tablespoons soy sauce, 1 1/2 tablespoons molasses, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 quart oil for frying, 1 1/2 (14 ounce) packages egg roll wrappers, 1 1/2 cups sweet and sour sauce, 
Directions: 0) Cook pork in a large wok over medium-high heat. 1) Drain and set aside. 2) In a large bowl, mix the cabbage, carrot, green bell pepper, onion, garlic and ginger. 3) In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch, soy sauce, and molasses until smooth. 4) Heat 2 tablespoons oil in wok. 5) Stir in cabbage mixture in batches, cooking each batch 3 to 4 minutes, just until tender. 6) Return vegetables to bowl, and mix in pork. 7) Stir in the cornstarch mixture. 8) Heat 1 quart oil in a deep fryer to 365 degrees F (185 degrees C). 9) Place about 1 tablespoon filling on each egg roll wrapper. 10) Fold one corner of wrapper over filling. 11) Fold wrapper sides over filling. 12) Roll wrappers to form egg rolls. 13) Fry egg rolls in batches in the hot oil until golden brown. 14) Drain on paper towels and serve with sweet and sour sauce.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 eggs, 1/4 cup water, 6 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 tablespoons chopped onion, 1 tablespoon butter, 1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, 1 cup milk, 1 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, divided, 1 1/2 teaspoons Dijon mustard, 1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 1/8 teaspoon salt, 2 cups frozen chopped broccoli, thawed, 
Directions: 0) For batter, combine the eggs, water, flour and salt in a blender. 1) Cover and process until smooth; let stand for 15 minutes. 2) Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, saute onion in butter until tender. 3) Stir in flour until blended. 4) Gradually stir in milk. 5) Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring constantly; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until slightly thickened. 6) Reduce heat to low. 7) Stir in 1/2 cup cheese, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, pepper and salt until cheese is melted. 8) Stir in broccoli. 9) Cover; keep warm. 10) Heat a lightly greased 8-in. nonstick skillet; pour 2 tablespoons batter into the center of skillet. 11) Lift and tilt pan to evenly coat bottom. 12) Cook until top appears dry; turn and cook 15-20 seconds longer. 13) Remove to a wire rack. 14) Repeat with remaining batter, greasing skillet as needed. 15) Spoon about 1/2 cup filling down the center of each crepe; roll up. 16) Place seam side down in an ungreased 11-in. baking dish. 17) Sprinkle with remaining cheese. 18) Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 5-7 minutes or until cheese is melted.

llama_answers: eggs, water, flour, and salt.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 24x8x1 inch untreated cedar plank, 6 (4 ounce) fillets salmon, 1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil, 1 large red onion, chopped, 1 lemon, sliced, 1/2 tablespoon black peppercorns, crushed, 
Directions: 0) Submerge untreated cedar plank in water. 1) Soak approximately 12 hours, or overnight. 2) Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat. 3) Place prepared plank on the grill, and sprinkle with coarse salt. 4) Cover grill and heat plank 2 to 3 minutes, until dry. 5) Adjust grill temperature for medium heat. 6) Rub salmon filets with olive oil. 7) Arrange on the plank. 8) Top salmon with red onion, lemon slices and black peppercorns. 9) Cook salmon, covered, 10 to 12 minutes, or until opaque and easily flaked with a fork.

llama_answers: The first two ingredients are untreated cedar plank and salmon fillets.

Ingredients: 24x8x1 inch untreated cedar plank, 6 (4 ounce) fillets salmon, 1/2 cup extra virgin olive oil, 1 large red onion, chopped, 1 lemon, sliced, 1/2 tablespoon black peppercorns, crushed, 
Directions: 0) Submerge untreated cedar plank in water. 1) Soak approximately 12 hours, or overnight. 2) Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat. 3) Place prepared plank on the grill, and sprinkle with coarse salt. 4) Cover grill and heat plank 2 to 3 minutes, until dry. 5) Adjust grill temperature for medium heat. 6) Rub salmon filets with olive oil. 7) Arrange on the plank. 8) Top salmon with red onion, lemon slices and black peppercorns. 9) Cook salmon, covered, 10 to 12 minutes, or until opaque and easily flaked with a fork.
Question: Ok. I have the oil and chopped the onion. What is next? 1 lemon, sliced Ok. I have them. What should I do now? 0) Submerge untreated cedar plank in water. Ok. For how long should it be in?
llama_answers: Soak it for approximately 12 hours, or overnight.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup sliced fresh mushrooms, 4 chicken drumsticks, skin removed, 4 chicken thighs, skin removed, 4 celery ribs, sliced, 1 cup sliced zucchini, 1 cup sliced carrots, 1 medium onion, sliced, 1 cup tomato juice, 1/2 cup chicken broth, 1 garlic clove, minced, 1/4 teaspoon paprika, pepper to taste, 3 tablespoons cornstarch, 3 tablespoons cold water, Hot cooked rice, 
Directions: 0) Place mushrooms and chicken in a slow cooker. 1) Add the celery, zucchini, carrots, onion, tomato juice, broth, garlic, paprika and pepper. 2) Cover and cook on low for 5 hours or until meat juices run clear. 3) Remove chicken and vegetables and keep warm. 4) Transfer cooking juices to a saucepan; skim fat. 5) Combine the cornstarch and water until smooth; add to the juices. 6) Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. 7) Pour over chicken and vegetables; serve over rice.
Question: Sounds good to me! How do I prepare that?
llama_answers: Pour over chicken and vegetables; serve over rice.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 12 helix snails, without shells, 1/2 cup butter, softened, 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped, 1 green onion, finely chopped, 1 tablespoon finely minced fresh parsley, 1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, 1/8 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 2 tablespoons dry white wine, 12 puff pastry shells, 12 mushroom caps, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Drain escargots; rinse in cold water and drain again. 2) In a mixing bowl, combine the butter, garlic, green onion, parsley, pepper, nutmeg and wine. 3) Mix thoroughly. 4) Place 1 teaspoon of butter mixture into each pastry shell. 5) Top each with 1 escargot, cover with another teaspoon of butter mixture and place mushroom cap on top. 6) Arrange pastry shells on a 10x15 inch baking sheet. 7) Bake in a preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes or until golden brown.
Question: Yes please! 12 helix snails, without shells OK! Can I use margarine instead of butter?
llama_answers: No, the recipe specifically calls for butter, so it's best to use butter instead of margarine.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast, 2 cups warm water (110 degrees to 115 degrees), divided, 1/3 cup sugar, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 tablespoon salt, 1/2 cup rye or whole wheat flour, 5 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 
Directions: 0) In a large mixing bowl, dissolve yeast in 1/2 cup of water. 1) Add sugar, oil, salt, rye or whole wheat flour, 3 cups all-purpose flour, and remaining water; beat until smooth. 2) Add enough remaining all-purpose flour to form a soft dough. 3) Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes. 4) Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top. 5) Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour. 6) Punch dough down. 7) Divide in half. 8) On a greased baking sheet, flatten each half to 1-in. 9) Pierce each loaf several times with a fork. 10) Cover and let rise in a warm place until nearly doubled, about 30 minutes. 11) Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
Question: Yes I'm ready. 1 (.25 ounce) package active dry yeast Ok good I have them ready. What are the next ingredients?
llama_answers: <no answer>

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup butter (no substitutes), softened, 1 cup packed brown sugar, 1 egg yolk, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/4 teaspoon salt, 4 (1.55 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy bar, broken into rectangles, 1/2 cup chopped walnuts, 
Directions: 0) In a mixing bowl, cream butter and brown sugar. 1) Add egg yolk and vanilla; mix well. 2) Combine flour and salt; add to creamed mixture. 3) Press into a greased 15-in pan. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F for 15-18 minutes or until golden brown. 5) Immediately place candy bar pieces over crust. 6) Let stand for 1 minute or until softened; spread chocolate evenly. 7) Sprinkle with walnuts. 8) Cool. 9) Cut into squares.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 1/2 teaspoons vegetable oil, 6 (6 inch) corn tortillas, cut into 1/2 inch strips, 3 cups chicken broth, 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon chili powder, 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, 1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained, 1 (15 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained, 2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces, 1/2 cup salsa, 1/2 cup chopped fresh cilantro, 
Directions: 0) Heat 2 teaspoons of the oil in a large pot over medium heat. 1) Add half of the tortilla strips, stirring often, until crisp. 2) Drain on paper towels. 3) Repeat with remaining 1/2 teaspoon of oil and remaining tortilla strips and set aside. 4) Add the broth, cumin, chili powder and oregano to the pot. 5) Raise heat to high and bring to a boil. 6) Add the beans, corn, chicken and salsa. 7) Reduce heat to low, stir and simmer for about 2 minutes, or until chicken is cooked through and no longer pink inside. 8) Add the cilantro and half of the reserved tortilla strips. 9) Ladle into individual bowls and garnish each bowl with some of the remaining strips.

Ingredients: 24 jalapeno peppers, 1 pound sausage, 2 cups all-purpose baking mix, 1 (16 ounce) package Cheddar cheese, shredded, 1 tablespoon crushed red pepper flakes, 1 tablespoon garlic salt, 1 (16 ounce) package Monterey Jack cheese, cubed,

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/4 cup olive oil, 8 cloves garlic, minced, 2 1/2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 2 tablespoons ground cumin, 1 tablespoon dried oregano, 1 (8 pound) leg of lamb, boned and butterflied to a more or less even thickness, 4 3/4 to 5 1/2 pounds trimmed weight, fell and most fat removed, 1 lemon, juiced, Minced fresh parsley, cilantro or mint  (optional), 
Directions: 0) Mix oil, garlic, salt, pepper, cumin and oregano; spread paste on both sides of the lamb and let stand for an hour until meat comes to room temperature. 1) Adjust oven rack to upper or upper-middle position (depending on lamb's thickness) and preheat broiler on high for at least 10 minutes. 2) Place lamb, cut side up, on a large wire rack set over a foil-lined roasting pan. 3) Broil, moving pan so entire surface browns evenly, about 8 minutes. 4) Turn lamb over; continue to broil until well browned on the other side, about 8 minutes longer. 5) Turn off broiler, remove lamb from oven and let rest for 10 minutes. 6) Heat oven to 325 degrees. 7) Stick a meat thermometer into the thickest portion of the lamb; return it to the oven. 8) Roast for a total of 50 minutes to 1 hour, until thermometer registers a rosy-pink 140 degrees. 9) Check lamb several times after 30 minutes. 10) If lamb gets done sooner, simply turn down oven to 170 degrees until ready to serve. 11) As soon as lamb comes out of the oven, squeeze on lemon juice and sprinkle with fresh herbs. 12) Carve, slicing across the grain when possible. 13) Arrange on a platter, drizzle with accumulated juices, and serve.
Question: Hi. how should I start making the Roasted Butterflied Leg of Lamb? 0) Mix oil, garlic, salt, pepper, cumin and oregano; spread paste on both sides of the lamb and let stand for an hour until meat comes to room temperature. Ok. should I mix it in a pan or a bowl?
llama_answers: Mix the oil, garlic, salt, pepper, cumin, and oregano in a bowl, then spread the paste on both sides of the lamb and let it stand for an hour until the meat comes to room temperature.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/4 cup olive oil, 8 cloves garlic, minced, 2 1/2 teaspoons salt, 1 teaspoon pepper, 2 tablespoons ground cumin, 1 tablespoon dried oregano, 1 (8 pound) leg of lamb, boned and butterflied to a more or less even thickness, 4 3/4 to 5 1/2 pounds trimmed weight, fell and most fat removed, 1 lemon, juiced, Minced fresh parsley, cilantro or mint  (optional), 
Directions: 0) Mix oil, garlic, salt, pepper, cumin and oregano; spread paste on both sides of the lamb and let stand for an hour until meat comes to room temperature. 1) Adjust oven rack to upper or upper-middle position (depending on lamb's thickness) and preheat broiler on high for at least 10 minutes. 2) Place lamb, cut side up, on a large wire rack set over a foil-lined roasting pan. 3) Broil, moving pan so entire surface browns evenly, about 8 minutes. 4) Turn lamb over; continue to broil until well browned on the other side, about 8 minutes longer. 5) Turn off broiler, remove lamb from oven and let rest for 10 minutes. 6) Heat oven to 325 degrees. 7) Stick a meat thermometer into the thickest portion of the lamb; return it to the oven. 8) Roast for a total of 50 minutes to 1 hour, until thermometer registers a rosy-pink 140 degrees. 9) Check lamb several times after 30 minutes. 10) If lamb gets done sooner, simply turn down oven to 170 degrees until ready to serve. 11) As soon as lamb comes out of the oven, squeeze on lemon juice and sprinkle with fresh herbs. 12) Carve, slicing across the grain when possible. 13) Arrange on a platter, drizzle with accumulated juices, and serve.
Question: Ok. the lamb rested for 10 minutes. What is the next step? 6) Heat oven to 325 degrees. Ok. the oven is heated. 7) Stick a meat thermometer into the thickest portion of the lamb; return it to the oven. Ok. I did. What should be the temperature?
llama_answers: The meat thermometer should register a rosy-pink 140 degrees.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup unsalted butter, 1 cup chai tea mix, 1 1/3 cups white sugar, 2 eggs, 3 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 tablespoon baking powder, 2 teaspoons salt, 1/2 cup white sugar for decoration, 
Directions: 0) In a large bowl, cream together the butter, 1 1/3 cups sugar, and chai tea mix until light and fluffy. 1) Beat in the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each. 2) Combine the flour, baking powder, and salt; blend into the creamed mixture until all of the dry has been absorbed. 3) Cover the dough, and refrigerate for 1 hour. 4) Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 5) Roll the cookie dough into walnut sized balls, and roll the balls in sugar. 6) Place the cookies onto greased cookie sheets about 3 inches apart, and flatten slightly using the tines of a fork. 7) Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven, just until the edges begin to brown. 8) Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 2 teaspoons salt, 1 1/2 teaspoons ground mustard, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 6 pork loin chops (3/4 inch thick), trimmed, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup, undiluted, 1/3 cup water, 
Directions: 0) In a shallow bowl, combine flour, salt, mustard and garlic powder; dredge pork chops. 1) In a skillet, brown the chops on both sides in oil. 2) Place in a slow cooker. 3) Combine soup and water; pour over chops. 4) Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or until meat is tender. 5) If desired, thicken pan juices and serve with the pork chops.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 12 ounces chopped raw bacon, 1 small white onion, chopped, 5 button mushrooms, chopped, 1 1/2 pounds extra-lean ground beef, 1 egg, 1/4 cup evaporated milk, 6 ounces shredded Swiss cheese, divided, 1/2 cup corn flake crumbs, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 1) Place bacon in a skillet and cook over medium heat until the pieces are browned. 2) Remove with a slotted spoon to paper towels. 3) Discard all but 1 tablespoon of bacon grease. 4) Stir in onions and mushrooms, and cook until soft. 5) Remove from heat. 6) In a large bowl, stir together beef, egg, and milk. 7) Stir in the onion and mushrooms. 8) Mix in about 4 ounces of Swiss cheese, and all but 1 tablespoon of bacon. 9) Stir in cornflake crumbs, and mix until well blended. 10) Shape into a loaf, and place in a meatloaf pan. 11) Bake in a preheated oven for 1 hour. 12) Drain fat, and sprinkle with remaining cheese and bacon. 13) Return to oven, and bake until cheese is melted, about 5 minutes.

Directions: 0) In a serving bowl, mix together the chicken, celery, and red onion. 1) In a separate bowl, stir together the mayonnaise, sour cream, feta cheese, and dill. 2) Pour over the chicken mixture, and stir to blend. 3) Taste, and season with salt and pepper as needed. 4) Serve immediately, or refrigerate until serving.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup white sugar, 1 cup water, 1 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, 2 tablespoons orange flower water, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1 egg, 1/2 teaspoon fresh lemon juice, 1 pinch salt, 1 tablespoon orange flower water, 4 cups raw almonds, 1 cup sugar, 3 eggs, 1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1 teaspoon vanilla powder, 1 lemon, zested, 2 tablespoons orange flower water, cornstarch, for rolling out the dough, pine nuts, for decoration, Bring 6 cups of water to a boil., 
Directions: 0) Bring 6 cups of water to a boil. 1) Remove from heat, and add the almonds. 2) Let the almonds soak in water for about 5 minutes, then drain and peel. 3) Spread the almonds on baking sheets, and bake at 200 degrees F(95 degrees C) until completely dry and toasted. 4) This takes several hours, and needs to be prepared ahead. 5) Be careful not to burn the nuts, as this will give a bitter taste to the filling. 6) Combine 1 cup sugar and 1 cup water in a saucepan, and bring to a boil. 7) Add 1 teaspoon lemon juice, reduce heat to low, and let it simmer until syrupy, about 30 to 40 minutes. 8) Stir in orange blossom water, and remove from heat. 9) Set sugar syrup aside. 10) Combine flour and salt in a large mixing bowl. 11) Make a hole in the center, and pour oil, egg, 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice, and 1 tablespoon orange blossom water into the center. 12) Mix with fingers until the dough resembles coarse crumbs. 13) Gradually sprinkle with warm water while mixing until the dough becomes soft and pliable. 14) Divide into 4 equal portions. 15) Cover dough with a wet cloth, and set aside. 16) In a food processor, finely grind the almonds. 17) Measure 3 cups of the finely ground almonds into a mixing bowl, and stir together with 1 cup sugar, baking powder, vanilla powder, lemon zest, and 2 tablespoons orange flower water. 18) Mix in three eggs one at a time, stirring constantly; mix until you get a sticky, paste-like mixture. 19) Sprinkle cornstarch on the rolling surface to prevent sticking. 20) Roll each portion of dough very thinly, 1 to 2 millimeters (1/16 inch). 21) Cut the rolled dough into circles of about 10 centimeters (4 inches) in diameter each. 22) Lightly wipe the surface of each circle with cornstarch, and fit into a tart mold, cornstarch side down to prevent sticking. 23) Gently press the dough onto the sides and bottom of the mold, and trim extra dough from around the rim. 24) Fill three quarters of each mold with the almond filling. 25) Bake on the top shelf at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 20 to 25 minutes, or until the surface of the tart is golden and the dough is firm. 26) Remove the tarts from the molds as soon as they come out of the oven. 27) Dip each tart in the sugar syrup while still hot. 28) Stick a pine nut into the middle of each tart for decoration. 29) Place on a wire rack to drain.
Question: Ok. I did that now. What should I do next? 2) Let the almonds soak in water for about 5 minutes, then drain and peel. Ok. Thanks. the almonds are all drained and peeled. What is the next step? 3) Spread the almonds on baking sheets, and bake at 200 degrees F(95 degrees C) until completely dry and toasted. Ok. in the oven right?
llama_answers: <no answer>

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup dates, pitted and chopped, 1 cup dark brown sugar, 1/4 cup margarine, 1 cup boiling water, 1 3/4 cups self-rising flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 1) Grease and flour a 9x5 inch loaf pan. 2) In a large bowl, combine dates, brown sugar, margarine and boiling water. 3) Let stand 15 minutes. 4) Stir in flour, soda and vanilla. 5) Pour batter into prepared pan. 6) Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes. 7) Allow to cool.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds russet potatoes, 1/2 cup all-purpose flour, 1 egg, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground nutmeg, 1/4 cup lard or other cooking fat, 
Directions: 0) Place whole potatoes in their skins into a large pot of boiling water; boil for 25 to 30 minutes. 1) Remove potatoes, and discard water. 2) When cool enough to handle, peel potatoes, and place on a lightly floured surface. 3) Mash potatoes with a rolling pin. 4) Place mashed potatoes into a large bowl. 5) Stir in flour, egg, parsley, salt, and nutmeg. 6) Knead well to form a smooth dough. 7) Then roll out the dough to a thickness of about 1/2 inch. 8) Cut flattened dough into thin strips, about 1 1/2 inches long. 9) Gently roll out the strips, or stretch them until the ends taper. 10) Set aside for 15 minutes. 11) In a large skillet, heat lard over medium heat. 12) Place the potato strips into the skillet, and fry until golden brown on both sides.
Question: Great! Yes, I like to prepare my ingredients right away! 1 1/2 pounds russet potatoes Ok good. Can I use almond flour instead of all purpose flour?
llama_answers: No, it's not recommended to use almond flour instead of all-purpose flour in this recipe, as all-purpose flour provides the necessary structure and texture for the potato pancakes. Almond flour is too fine and would result in a dense and heavy batter. Stick with all-purpose flour for the best results.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup butter, 1 cup white sugar, 1 egg, 1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract, 2 1/2 cups sifted all-purpose flour, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup rolled oats, 1/4 teaspoon peppermint extract, 3 drops red food coloring, 2 tablespoons confectioners' sugar, 5 (1.5 ounce) bars milk chocolate candy, 
Directions: 0) In a medium bowl, cream together butter or margarine and white sugar until light and fluffy. 1) Blend in egg and vanilla. 2) Sift together flour and salt. 3) Add to creamed mixture and mix well. 4) Stir in oats. 5) Divide dough in half. 6) Add peppermint extract and a few drops of food color to half of dough. 7) Chill for several hours. 8) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 9) Roll out each half of dough to 1/8 inch thickness on surface sprinkled lightly with confectioners' sugar. 10) Cut out half of each color with the 2 1/2 inch heart shaped cookie cutter, and half with a 1 1/2 inch cookie cutter. 11) Place them on unprepared cookie sheets. 12) Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. 13) Remove from oven and place 1 one square (1/8) of a chocolate bar onto the center of each large heart. 14) Place small heart on top and press lightly to secure. 15) Transfer to rack to cool.
Question: Yes. how should I start? 0) In a medium bowl, cream together butter or margarine and white sugar until light and fluffy. Ok. done. what should I do now? 1) Blend in egg and vanilla. How much vanilla extract should I add?
llama_answers: Blend in 1 egg and 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 cup shortening, 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces, 
Directions: 0) Heat the shortening in a large, cast iron skillet over medium-high heat. 1) In a brown paper lunch bag, combine the flour, salt, and pepper. 2) Shake two chicken pieces in the bag to coat, and place them in the skillet. 3) Repeat until all of the chicken is coated and in the skillet. 4) Fry the chicken over medium-high heat until all of the pieces have been browned on both sides. 5) Turn the heat to medium-low, cover, and cook for 25 minutes. 6) Remove the lid, and increase heat to medium-high. 7) Continue frying until chicken pieces are a deep golden brown, and the juices run clear.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 1/2 cups packed brown sugar, 2/3 cup shortening, 1 tablespoon water, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 2 eggs, 1 1/2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/3 cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon baking soda, 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips, 1/2 cup evaporated milk, 1/2 cup white sugar, 1/4 cup shortening, 2 egg yolks, beaten, 1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract, 1/2 cup chopped pecans, 1/2 cup flaked coconut, 
Directions: 0) Combine brown sugar, 2/3 cup shortening, water, and 1 teaspoon vanilla in large bowl. 1) Beat eggs into creamed mixture. 2) In another bowl, combine flour, cocoa, salt, and baking soda. 3) Mix this mixture into creamed mixture until just blended. 4) Stir in chocolate chips. 5) Drop rounded tablespoonfuls of dough onto ungreased baking sheet about 2 inches apart. 6) Place cookie sheet in the middle of the oven. 7) Cool for 2 minutes on baking sheet. 8) Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely. 9) To Make Frosting: Begin by combining evaporated milk, white sugar, 1/4 cup shortening, and egg yolks in medium saucepan. 10) Stir 1/2 teaspoon vanilla, pecans, and coconut into the warm mixture. 11) Cool completely, and frost cooled cookies.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 teaspoons olive oil, 4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves, 1 (10 ounce) can refrigerated large crescent roll dough, 8 ounces Brie cheese, 1 bunch fresh spinach, rinsed and stems removed, 4 (1/2 ounce) slices prosciutto, 
Directions: 0) Heat oil in a heavy skillet; or spray a nonstick frying pan with cooking spray. 1) Saute chicken breasts until no longer pink, and juices run clear; set aside. 2) Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C). 3) Unroll 4 large crescent rolls. 4) Layer each with 3 thin slices brie, 3 leaves spinach and 1 slice prosciutto. 5) Place chicken breast in the center of dough. 6) Wrap and tuck dough around chicken until completely enclosed. 7) Place seam side down on baking sheet. 8) Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, or until golden brown.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup shortening, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup cold water, 2 apples, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 cup vegetable oil, 
Directions: 0) Peel and dice apples. 1) Add sugar and cinnamon. 2) Cook in a saucepan on low heat. 3) Cook until soft, then mash with fork to form a thick applesauce. 4) Sift flour and salt together. 5) Cut in the shortening. 6) Add water and mix with fork. 7) Roll out to about 1/8 inch thick on a floured board. 8) Cut with a large cookie cutter (4 inches in diameter). 9) In each round, place 1 heaping tablespoon fruit. 10) Moisten edges with cold water, fold and press edge with a fork. 11) Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat. 12) Fry pies, a few at a time, 2 to 3 minutes on each side; cook until golden brown. 13) Drain on paper towels. 14) Sprinkle with confectioners sugar.

Ingredients: 2 cups all-purpose flour, 1/2 cup shortening, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 cup cold water, 2 apples, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 cup vegetable oil, 
Directions: 0) Peel and dice apples. 1) Add sugar and cinnamon. 2) Cook in a saucepan on low heat. 3) Cook until soft, then mash with fork to form a thick applesauce. 4) Sift flour and salt together. 5) Cut in the shortening. 6) Add water and mix with fork. 7) Roll out to about 1/8 inch thick on a floured board. 8) Cut with a large cookie cutter (4 inches in diameter). 9) In each round, place 1 heaping tablespoon fruit. 10) Moisten edges with cold water, fold and press edge with a fork. 11) Heat oil in a large skillet on medium-high heat. 12) Fry pies, a few at a time, 2 to 3 minutes on each side; cook until golden brown. 13) Drain on paper towels. 14) Sprinkle with confectioners sugar.
Question: Ok I have done that. What is next? 2) Cook in a saucepan on low heat. Ok it became a thick apple sauce now. What is the following step? 4) Sift flour and salt together. Ok should I use all of it?
llama_answers: Yes, you should use all of the flour and salt that you sifted together.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 (18 ounce) package small chocolate chip cookies, 1/4 cup margarine, melted, 1 cup hot fudge topping, 2 quarts vanilla ice cream, 1 cup whipped cream, 12 cherries, 
Directions: 0) Crush half the cookies (about 20) to make crumbs. 1) Combine crumbs with melted margarine and press into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan or pie plate. 2) Stand remaining cookies around edge of pan. 3) Spread 3/4 cup fudge topping over crust. 4) Freeze 15 minutes. 5) Meanwhile, soften 1 quart of ice cream in microwave or on countertop. 6) After crust has chilled, spread softened ice cream over fudge layer. 7) Freeze 30 minutes. 8) Scoop remaining quart of ice cream into balls and arrange over spread ice cream layer. 9) Freeze until firm, 4 hours or overnight. 10) To serve, garnish with remainder of fudge topping, whipped cream and cherries.
Question: That sounds just great. I'm ready. 1 (18 ounce) package small chocolate chip cookies Ok. How large should the package be?
target_answer: 1 (18 ounce) package small chocolate chip cookies
llama_answers: 18 ounces.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 3 ounces reduced fat cream cheese, softened, 1 cup fat-free milk, 1 cup egg substitute, 1/4 teaspoon pepper, 3 cups shredded reduced-fat Cheddar cheese, 1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed dry, 1 cup frozen chopped broccoli, thawed and well drained, 1 small onion, finely chopped, 5 fresh mushrooms, sliced, 
Directions: 0) In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese. 1) Add milk, egg substitute and pepper; beat until smooth. 2) Stir in remaining ingredients. 3) Add the mixture to a quiche pan coated with nonstick cooking spray. 4) Bake at 350 degrees F for 45-50 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
Question: Yes I'd like that! 3 ounces reduced fat cream cheese, softened Ok, is it ok if I use normal milk?
target_answer: 3 ounces reduced fat cream cheese, softened
llama_answers: Yes, you can use frozen chopped spinach instead of thawed and squeezed dry. Just thaw and squeeze out as much liquid as possible before adding it to the quiche mixture.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 6 figs, halved, 6 ounces goat cheese, 1/2 cup toasted, chopped pecans, 3 slices bacon, cut in half, 
Directions: 0) Preheat the broiler. 1) Stuff fig halves with goat cheese. 2) Press pecans into the cheese. 3) Wrap each stuffed fig half with half a slice of bacon, securing with toothpicks. 4) Arrange on a medium baking sheet. 5) Broil 5 minutes, or until bacon is evenly brown and crisp and goat cheese is bubbly and lightly browned.

Recipe:
Ingredients: 6 frozen prepared bean and cheese burritos, 2 tablespoons butter or margarine, 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 3/4 cups water, 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce, 1 1/2 teaspoons chili powder, 1 teaspoon beef bouillon granules, 3/4 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups shredded Mexican blend cheese or Cheddar cheese, 1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced ripe olives, drained, 1/3 cup chopped green onions, 
Directions: 0) Place frozen burritos in a greased 13-in baking dish; set aside. 1) In a saucepan, melt butter. 2) Stir in flour until smooth; gradually stir in water. 3) Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. 4) Add the tomato sauce, chili powder, bouillon, cumin and salt. 5) Simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until thickened. 6) Pour over the burritos. 7) Sprinkle with cheese, olives if desired and onions. 8) Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F (176 degrees C) for 35-40 minutes or until heated through.
Question: Ok, could we prepare them before we start with the recipe?
target_answer: 6 frozen prepared bean and cheese burritos
llama_answers: Yes, you can prepare the burritos before starting the recipe.

Ingredients: 6 frozen prepared bean and cheese burritos, 2 tablespoons butter or margarine, 3 tablespoons all-purpose flour, 1 3/4 cups water, 1 (8 ounce) can tomato sauce, 1 1/2 teaspoons chili powder, 1 teaspoon beef bouillon granules, 3/4 teaspoon ground cumin, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 2 cups shredded Mexican blend cheese or Cheddar cheese, 1 (2.25 ounce) can sliced ripe olives, drained, 1/3 cup chopped green onions, 
Directions: 0) Place frozen burritos in a greased 13-in baking dish; set aside. 1) In a saucepan, melt butter. 2) Stir in flour until smooth; gradually stir in water. 3) Bring to a boil; cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. 4) Add the tomato sauce, chili powder, bouillon, cumin and salt. 5) Simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until thickened. 6) Pour over the burritos. 7) Sprinkle with cheese, olives if desired and onions. 8) Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F (176 degrees C) for 35-40 minutes or until heated through.
Question: Ok, could we prepare them before we start with the recipe? 6 frozen prepared bean and cheese burritos Ok good, can I have three more ingredients? 1 3/4 cups water Ok, how big should the tomato sauce be?
llama_answers: 8 ounces.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 recipe pastry for a 9 inch double crust pie, 1 (21 ounce) can apple pie filling, 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg, 1 teaspoon lemon zest, 1 egg, 1/3 cup white sugar, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 3 ounces cream cheese, 1/4 cup sour cream, 
Directions: 0) Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). 1) Roll out pastry shell and allow to rest in refrigerator. 2) Line a 9 inch pie pan with one rolled out pastry crust. 3) In a medium mixing bowl combine pie filling, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon rind. 4) Stir until fully combined and spread into pastry lined pan. 5) In a small mixer bowl combine egg, sugar, lemon juice, cream cheese, and sour cream. 6) Beat at medium speed until smooth. 7) Spread cheese mixture over apple mixture, and place top crust over filling. 8) Seal edges, cut some steam vents in top crust, and sprinkle top with sugar. 9) Bake in preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, until golden brown. 10) Cool completely before serving.

input:
Recipe:
Ingredients: 1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat, 1 cup chicken broth, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, 1 1/2 cups milk, 3 tablespoons butter, 1 onion, chopped, 1 cup chopped celery, 1/3 cup all-purpose flour, 2 cups frozen mixed vegetables, thawed, 1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme, 1 (9 inch) pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie, 1 egg, lightly beaten, 
Directions: 0) In a large saucepan over medium high heat, combine the chicken meat, chicken broth, salt and pepper. 1) Bring to a boil and reduce heat to low. 2) Cover and let simmer for 30 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear. 3) Remove the chicken and let cool. 4) Pour the remaining chicken broth mixture into a measuring cup. 5) Let stand; spoon off fat. 6) Add enough milk to the broth mixture to equal 2 1/2 cups. 7) Cut chicken into 1/2 inch pieces. 8) In the same pan, melt butter or margarine over medium heat. 9) Add the onion and celery. 10) Saute, stirring, for 3 minutes. 11) Stir in flour until well blended. 12) Gradually stir in broth mixture. 13) Simmer, stirring constantly, until the sauce thickens and boils. 14) Add the chicken, vegetables, parsley and thyme. 15) Pour mixture into a 1 1/2 quart deep casserole dish. 16) Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). 17) Roll out pastry 1 inch larger than the diameter of the casserole dish on a lightly floured surface. 18) Cut slits in the pastry for venting air. 19) Place pastry on top of casserole. 20) Roll edges and cut away extra pastry; flute edges by pinching together. 21) Brush pastry with beaten egg and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbling. 22) Let cool for 10 minutes and serve.
Question: Yes. What are the first two ingredients?
target_answer: 1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat
llama_answers: chicken and chicken broth.
